document.heading: District of Columbia Sightseeing Bus Registration Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 3-139, the “District of Columbia Sightseeing Bus Registration Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-301, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 29, 1980 and September 16, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 2, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-260 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
